text: Claudia and David is a 1946 American comedy movie directed by Walter Lang and is the sequel to the 1943 movie Claudia and also based on the short stories by Rose Franken. It stars Dorothy McGuire, Robert Young, Mary Astor, John Sutton, Gail Patrick, Rose Hobart, Harry Davenport, Florence Bates and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Walter Lang
title: Claudia and David
